tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE articles (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  content TEXT,
  author VARCHAR(100),
  bias_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
 article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 title VARCHAR(255),
 author VARCHAR(100),
 content TEXT,
 bias_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE article_bias (
 article_id INT,
 bias_id INT,
 PRIMARY KEY (article_id, bias_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (bias_id) REFERENCES political_bias(bias_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
 user_id INT,
 bias_id INT,
 PRIMARY KEY (user_id, bias_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (bias_id) REFERENCES political_bias(bias_id)
);
